Package model.gameV2

Class Player

java.lang.Object
model.gameV2.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Player>
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Player>
Represents a Player. A Object of this Class stores the Player's username, his actual Hand, his discarded Cards, the number of his Wins an if he's protected. Provides functionality for gameplay and access.
Author:
Dennis, Josef, Ehbal

      public void requestAction​(Game game, Card card)
      Asks the Player what Card he want's to play. Is always called when a new move starts.
      Parameters:
      game - Current Game State
      card - New Card that is drawn from the Deck

    • countDiscardedScore

      public int countDiscardedScore()
      "In case of a tie, players add the numbers on the cards in their discard pile. The highest total wins."
      Returns:
      sum of values of the game.player's discarded cards

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(Player o)
      Comparing players according to the game rules: 1. Compare last card on hand. If tied: 2. Compare sum total of discarded cards by the game.player
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Player>
      Parameters:
      o - other Player to compare to
      Returns:
      negative int for smaller, zero for equal, positive int for bigger
